name: ShieldOgre
description:
(If it runs on butt on web, lemme know and try the downloadable version!)

Play as the pseudo-pacifist SHIELD OGRE.
Take on the BAPS
TAKE NONE OF THEIR SHIT


There are 5 waves, and the final trigger doesn't work so if you get there just wait for the timer to take you to win. Thanks for playing!

WASD - Movement

SPACE - JumpSlam
SPACE [HOLD] - Block bullets below
SPACE (Perfect Timing) - Deflect

Having enemies get hit again while dying gives a bonus to the score drops!

Thanks Miziziziz for hosting and Kenney for providing the art pack!

Song1 is Chiptune2 by Chippy01302 on Itch.io

Song2 is Underwater Battle by Davidkvis99 on OpenGameArt

Hey, it's my first game!
